content: thank you ♥ february 2013 5 magic with hook and needles w ww vendulkam blogspot com yoke size 5 years round 25 divide the yoke into fronts back and sleeves work shell pattern make 6 shells for one front 36 stitches mark the 37th stitch then skip the next 55 stitches for the sleeve to make the double_crochet for the beginning of the next shell insert the hook into both the 37th and the 93rd stitches see picture bellow please and finish working the double_crochet as usual continue working the shell pattern across the back 12 shells 72 stitches mark the 165th stitch skip 55 stitches for the second sleeve then make 1 double_crochet for the beginning of the next shell by inserting the hook into the marked 165th and the 221th stitches together and finish working the double_crochet continue working shells across the front yoke stitches maek 6 shells © vendula maderska 2013 the patterns are intended for personal use only that means none commercial purposes all rights reserved you are not allowed neither to sell copy share translate to another language and publish the patterns or parts of it sell the creation made from these patterns without particularly permission of the author if you have any questions feel free to ask on this e-mail vendula maderska@seznam cz thank you ♥ february 2013 6 magic with hook and needles w ww vendulkam blogspot com continue working shell pattern see diagram below work across the right front skip the stitches for the right sleeve work across the back skip the left sleeve stitches then work across the left front there are now 24 shells 6 shells on right front 12 on back 6 on left front work 24 rounds in shell pattern as follows © vendula maderska 2013 the patterns are intended for personal use only that means none commercial purposes all rights reserved you are not allowed neither to sell copy share translate to another language and publish the patterns or parts of it sell the creation made from these patterns without particularly permission of the author if you have any questions feel free to ask on this e-mail vendula maderska@seznam cz thank you ♥ february 2013 7 magic with hook and needles w ww vendulkam blogspot com round 1 work 3 times round 2 work 4 times round 3 work 16 times written shell pattern lower part of cardigan round 1 3 chain counts as 1st double_crochet skip 2 stitches 3 double_crochet 2 chain 3 double_crochet all in the next stitch skip 2 stitches *1 double_crochet skip 2 stitches 3 double_crochet 2 chain 3 double_crochet in next stitch skip 2 stitches* repeat from * to end turn round 2 3ch * 3dc 2 chain 3 double_crochet in the 2ch from the previous round 1 double_crochet in the 1 double_crochet form the previous round* repeat from * to end turn round 3 repeat round 2 round 4 3ch * 3 double_crochet 2 chain 3 double_crochet in 2 chain from
